misc: Rarely uses his driver, which has raised questions about his masculinity.
biography: Ossi, a competitor known for his strategic play and thoughtful demeanor, brings a unique flavor to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Representing Kullo Golf Club, Ossi's presence is always marked by his calm focus and meticulous approach to the game.

Having participated in the Hector Trophée twice, Ossi is gearing up for his third appearance in the upcoming tournament. Despite not having secured a victory in the Hector Trophée or an individual Victor trophy yet, Ossi's dedication to improvement is evident in his evolving techniques and refined strategies.

A distinctive aspect of Ossi's game is his infrequent use of the driver, a choice that has sparked considerable discussion among peers and commentators alike. Regardless of these external opinions, Ossi remains steadfast in his approach, underscoring his commitment to playing the game his way.
